ch.unizh.ini.friend.gui
Class SpikeSound

java.lang.Object
  ch.unizh.ini.friend.gui.SpikeSound

public class SpikeSound
extends Object

Plays a spike sound on the speaker. Use it by constructing a new SpikeSound, then calling the play() method.

Version:
$Revision: 1.8 $
Author:
tobi

public void play()
